songs.title: Dreamy Eyes
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm reaching out to touch you
In the middle of the night
And I don't know if I've been sleeping
But I hold my pillow tight
Are you real or are you my imagination playing games?
I can set you free
You'll always be my eternal flame

[Chorus]
Your dreamy eyes
They just won't say good-bye
Well, it must be my fate 'cause I just can't escape
And the passion never dies
Oh, dreamy eyes
No matter how I cry
I just can't reach your dreamy eyes

[Verse 2]
You're a vision of tomorrow
And a ghost from yesterday
And I'll be trying not to let you
Take my breath away
You're a summer breeze
That comes and goes
But somehow lingers on
Tell me, how can I forget you
If you're never really gone?

[Chorus]
Your dreamy eyes
They just won't say good-bye
Well, it must be my fate 'cause I just can't escape
And the passion never dies
Oh, dreamy eyes
No matter how I cry
I just can't reach your dreamy eyes

[Bridge]
What do I have to do
To get that close to you?
And your...

[Chorus]
Your dreamy eyes
They just won't say good-bye
Well, it must be my fate 'cause I just can't escape
And the passion never dies
Oh, I try so hard to release you
But no matter how I cry
I just keep seein' through dreamy eyes
Ooh, dreamy eyes
